profile:
National Capital Irrigation & Hydroseeding is a full-service irrigation & hydroseeding contractor operating in the Greater-Ottawa region.
 
We offer the following services:

IRRIGATION:
Design & Installation of Custom Lawn Sprinkler Systems
Service & Upgrades for all existing irrigation systems
Annual maintenance for residential & commercial clients

LANDSCAPE LIGHTING:
Professionally designed and installed low-voltage lighting systems.

Hydroseeding & Erosion Control solutions

National Capital Irrigation & Hydro-seeding Systems offers a range of premium services to its Ottawa and area customers.
I launched the business in 2002, during my third year at the University of Ottawa. Upon graduation the following year, I concentrated on further developing and growing the business.

The growth strategy for the business has remained constant. We listen to customers to ensure that we understand their needs, and we work with them to develop their preferred solution. We use premium parts and call on experienced staff to complete jobs. Consequently, we can stand behind our work with an industry-leading warranty. We enjoy an A+ rating from the BBB and we count heavily on referrals to continue to grow. Give us a call, and allow us to assist you in our areas of expertise.

Irrigation
We have a decade of demonstrated expertise designing, installing and servicing automatic sprinkler systems for residential and commercial customers. The hundreds of premium systems we have installed includes residential and estates of all sizes and complexities, and a broad range of commercial enterprises. We own and operate modern irrigation equipment, and all installation and service is provided by in-house full-time staff who have years of experience.

Hydroseeding Service for Establishing a New Lawn.
Hydroseeding services are available, offering property owners a superior middle-ground solution between seeding and sodding when they are creating new lawns. We own and operate premium hydroseeding equipment, and only use high quality ingredients to maximize the results our customers obtain. Application is always done by experienced staff.

Landscape lighting
Landscape lighting is offered to our customers who wish to increase the after-dark use, safety and beauty of their exterior space. In this business segment, we focus our offerings on premium lighting products. We employ professional lighting designers to create your imagined outcome, and we use our team of experienced installers to ensure that work is done correctly and safely, and stunning results are achieved.
services:
Irrigation, & Lighting System Installations, Service & Maintenance.
Hydroseeding Services for projects of all sizes.

profile:
Running Irrigation - Expert Quality. Competitive Pricing.

We are an irrigation contractor dedicated to customer satisfaction by providing excellent service and high quality automatic sprinkler system installations at an affordable price.  Homeowners who value the appearance and health of their landscape can benefit from a Running Irrigation inground sprinkler system. All products and equipment that we use is Top-Of-The-Line and has been chosen specifically for its ability to meet our customers exacting standards.
service_area: Ottawa and the surrounding National Capital Region including Kanata, Stittsville, Manotick, Orleans, West Carleton, Arnprior, Pakenham, Almonte, Carleton Place and ...
products: Irrigation systems, automatic sprinklers (rotors, pop-ups, risers, rotators), valves, controllers, rain sensors, lighting systems
services: Irrigation system installation, irrigation system servicing (maintenance, repairs), irrigation system winterization (fall closing), irrigation system Spring opening
specialities: Expert quality irrigation systems, head-to-head coverage
payment_method: cash, cheque, email money transfer, credit card (3% charge)

- Certified Irrigation Technician
- Bachelor of Applied Science - Chemical Engineering
project_rate: Variable according to property size and landscape style.
warranty_terms: 3-year guarantee on workmanship and labour, Manufacturers warranty on parts

KŌENA is a Hawaiian word meaning “balance”. The tropical paradise of the Hawaiian Islands embodies the culture of wellness and slow living. This is what we want you to experience during your getaway at KŌENA Spa.

    Gentle heat

First of all, wrap yourself in warmth that will delight you in our two saunas and our steam bath.

    Invigorating cold

Then plunge into our cold pool to invigorate yourself.

    Complete relaxation

Finally, enjoy a well-deserved moment of relaxation in our five restrooms, fourteen treatment rooms or three hot baths.
